overview.title: Disaster Risk Reduction & Resilience Framework
overview.subtitle: Framework Overview
overview.paragraph1: The Disaster Risk Reduction & Resilience Framework provides a comprehensive approach to building community resilience through innovative governance, sustainable development, and collaborative engagement across all levels of society.
overview.paragraph2: This framework emphasizes community-centered approaches, indigenous knowledge integration, and ecosystem-based solutions to create adaptive and transformative resilience in the face of increasing climate and disaster risks.
